title: Reviving Memories: AI-Powered Photo Restoration and Extension
description: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing the preservation of photographs by offering tools for restoring faded, damaged, and incomplete images. These technologies allow individuals and organizations to reconnect with their pasts, making preservation faster and more accessible, while enhancing and expanding cherished visual memories.
content: In an era where memories are often preserved through digital pixels, the fragility of physical photographs presents a persistent challenge. Over time, printed images fade, tear, and degrade, compromising cherished fragments of personal history and cu... [905 chars]

title: India's diversity a strength in AI era, solutions built here can benefit world: Pradhan
description: NEW DELHI, Dec 16:  India’s linguistic and socio-cultural diversity is a strength in the age of Artificial Intelligence (AI), Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan said on Tuesday, adding that solutions built here in healthcare, education and agriculture can also benefit other regions such as Africa and Latin America.   Describing technology as a strategic driver of national transformation, the minister said estimates indicate AI can add nearly USD 1.7 trillion to India’s economy by 2035. “But AI is not only […]
content:

title: 10 words people googled the most in 2025 as per Google Trends report
description: Google’s Year in Search 2025, offers a powerful snapshot of what captured global attention throughout the year. From artificial intelligence breakthroughs to international sports rivalries and major geopolitical events, the most searched topics reflect people’s curiosity, concerns, and passions. These searches reveal how technology, sports, and world affairs shaped conversations and digital behaviour worldwide. Here is a list of most popular trending google searches for the year 2025, according to Google Trends -Image Credit: Canva

title: TrinaTracker Showcases AI-Driven Innovations that Elevate Utility-Scale Solar Plant Operations
description: TrinaTracker, a business unit of Trinasolar, recently participated in a webinar titled “Smart Trackers, Smarter O&M: AI’s Role in Solar Plant Operations”. The session examined how the integration of smart tracking systems and artificial intelligence is enhancing the operational performance and reliability of utility-scale solar plants.
content: The webinar underscored TrinaTracker’s ability to help operators enhance energy generation and improve revenue outcomes, particularly in markets with real-time electricity pricing. Speakers also highlighted several persistent operation and maintenanc... [2831 chars]
